name: SPEED: Downtown Showdown
description:
SPEED: Downtown Showdown has arrived!
SPEED is a city racing simulator that allows you to cruise around, challenge other racers and take part in special racing events. You can also bet extra money on yourself, crush your opponents, earn mad cash and purchase awesome new rides to fill your garage!

FEATURES Take full control of the action! Steering is made easy with our specially tuned controls, and no auto-acceleration guarantees your car is under your full control. Tilt your device to steer, your screen is divided between acceleration and break pedals. Not enough? Then activate your nitro for that needed extra boost!!

Beautiful cars and a live, bubbling cityscape! Cruise around our city, dodging traffic and exploring awesome locations, from boulevards to construction sites. Challenge other racers you meet and stand in awe at their amazing rides. If you win enough you’ll be able to purchase even cooler vehicles!!
The highest of stakes! Of course you get cash for winning races. But suppose you’re feeling extra lucky or extra skilled, why not bet extra cash and bring all you got to every race? Sky is the Limit!!
You may as well pimp your ride! Purchase new awesome cars, customize them and cruise around to enjoy your hot wheels.

No auto-acceleration in this one, you dictate the action, you really control the car! Steer by tilting your device, Nitro your way into great speeds and rule the streets. The city is yours!!
We’re still starting the SPEED adventure, download, enjoy and review so we know what to improve!
